data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Barnsley with the kick-off.
Huddersfield's Rarmani Edmonds-Green scores with his head to give his side a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 21, Michal Helik levels the score at 1-1.
Barnsley's Michal Helik has been booked in Barnsley.
The first half has been concluded at Oakwell Ground.
In the minute 46, It's Huddersfield with the kick-off after the break.
The home team replace Dominik Frieser with Victor Adeboyejo.
Alex Pritchard is replacing Carel Eiting for Huddersfield at Oakwell Ground.
In the minute 74, Barnsley make their second substitution with Luke Thomas replacing Conor Chaplin.
Herbie Kane is replacing Matty James for the home team.
Carlos Corberan is making the team's second substitution at Oakwell Ground with Adama Diakhaby replacing Isaac Mbenza.
In the minute 87, George Miller is on a sub for Cauley Woodrow for Barnsley.
Barnsley make their fifth substitution with Romal Palmer replacing Alex Mowatt.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Michal Helik.
